Name: Shady Grove Cooler
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Long and refreshing with lime freshness and a hint of ginger.
Nutrition: One serving of Shady Grove Cooler contains 185 calories
